statements: DELETE FROM security_events WHERE status = 'Pending' AND severity > 3;
DELETE FROM security_events WHERE status = 'blocked' AND severity > 5;
DELETE FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM financial_networks WHERE id = 1 AND network_name = 'ABC Network';
DELETE FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Security Breach' AND event_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_level = 'High' AND alert_type = 'Unauthorized Access';
DELETE FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Access Denied';
DELETE FROM siem_systems WHERE system_name = 'SIEM-123' AND system_vendor = 'Vendor-XYZ';
